history.proof: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3. srun best use: existSys unfold: System, existH, Formula, SysPrf.

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply existE with (T := Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) (g := g).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T H2 : ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) H3 : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g Unable to unify "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g" with "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g".

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T H2 : ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) H3 : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g Unable to unify "~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T" with "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g".

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T H2 : ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) H3 : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g Unable to unify "~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g)" with "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g".

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T H2 : ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) H3 : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g Unable to unify "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g" with "SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g".

original: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3. apply existE with (T := Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) (g := g). - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply H3.
